description: Even more flashy fun is coming to the ScareScraper! This time, Cap’n Weegee, The Amazing Luigi, and Paleontoluigist (yes, Paleontoluigist) costumes are available! Play ScareScraper to see the matching floor themes and themed ghosts based on each of these spooky-yet-stylish costumes. ScreamPark is also getting three new attractions—PuckStravaganza, Floaty Frenzy, and Desperate Measures.
name: Luigi’s Mansion™ 3 Multiplayer Pack 2
